org.ops4j.peaberry
Interface ServiceScope

All Known Subinterfaces:
ServiceRegistry
All Known Implementing Classes:
OSGiServiceRegistry
public interface ServiceScope

A dynamic collection of exported services with associated attributes. ServiceScopes can be nested - when a service is exported it will be automatically exported to any contained ServiceScope instances that have "scope.filter" attributes that match the exported service.

Field Summary
static String SCOPE_FILTER
          "scope.filter" attribute name - an LDAP filter that defines which services can also be exported to the nested ServiceScope instance.
 
Method Summary
<S,T extends S>
Export<S>
export(T service, Map<String,?> attributes)
          Export the given service to this scope with the associated attributes.
 

Field Detail

SCOPE_FILTER

static final String SCOPE_FILTER
"scope.filter" attribute name - an LDAP filter that defines which services can also be exported to the nested ServiceScope instance.

Method Detail

<S,T extends S> Export<S> export(T service,

Export the given service to this scope with the associated attributes.

Parameters:

attributes - service attributes
Returns:
exported service handle, null if the scope is not interested
